main event: A round, oxidized silver object was observed by ground radar and visually at Keflavic Airport, Iceland on May 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a small plane and left a small smoke trail.
The object exhibited very erratic motions and great speed, not comparable to a jet aircraft.
The object was observed for 5-8 seconds before disappearing.
On May 8, 1955, a bright light was observed by the control tower personnel at Keflavic Airport, hovering or moving very slowly for about 10 minutes before disappearing.
On March 5, 1955, an oval-shaped, silver object was observed oscillating or pulsating and much brighter than the surrounding sky at Keflavic Airport.
sighted object: round, oxidized silver object; bright light; oval-shaped, silver object
